Class FlashingBall

  • java.lang.Object
    • MovingObject
      • FlashingBall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class FlashingBall
extends MovingObject
    This class implements a flashing ball. Feel free to change this, implement a new object, change the animation, etc.
    Version:
    November 2015
    Author:
    Christina Kemp adapted from Sam Scott

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int counter
      Counts the frames between flash on/off.
      private boolean filledIn
      Controls the flash - true if the ball is filled in, false if it is an outline.
      private int flashSpeed
      The number of frames to wait before toggling the flash.
      private int radius
      The radius of the ball.

      • Fields inherited from class MovingObject

        color

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlashingBall(double x, double y, int left, int right, int top, int bottom)
      Calls the superclass constructor, plus sets radius, and flash parameters.

    • Method Summary

      Controls the animation parameters.
      void draw(Graphics g)
      Draws the ball
      boolean isFilled()
      Returns true if the ball is filled in.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlashingBall

        public FlashingBall(double x,
                    double y,
                    int left,
                    int right,
                    int top,
                    int bottom)
        Calls the superclass constructor, plus sets radius, and flash parameters.
        Parameters:
        x - The x location.
        y - The y location.
        left - The left edge.
        right - The right edge.
        top - The top edge.
        bottom - The bottom edge.

    • Method Detail

      • animateOneStep

        public void animateOneStep()
        Controls the animation parameters. (Called once every time the ball position is updated.)

      • isFilled

        public boolean isFilled()
        Returns true if the ball is filled in.
